name: PictureElement
body: Picture Element ============== Picture Polyfill ##The HTML Element ```html ``` ##Picture Element Demo * http://shum.nl/pictureelement ##Browser Support * IE 6+ * Chrome * Firefox 3.6+ * Opera * Safari * iOS * Android 2.3+ ##You need this * pictureElement.js ##Embedded Polyfills * https://github.com/weblinc/media-match
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
